cards.name: Ancestral Lands
cards.meaning: Honor the wisdom of those who came before. Plant seeds passed down through generations.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on heirloom varieties and heritage seeds with historical significance

cards.name: Aquamarine
cards.meaning: Crystal clear intentions guide your garden. Water brings life and courage to grow.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest water-loving plants and those needing protection from harsh conditions

cards.name: Aries
cards.meaning: Bold action and fiery energy. Time to start ambitious garden projects.
cards.agent_prompt: Recommend fast-growing, bold plants and new planting initiatives

cards.name: Aromatherapy
cards.meaning: The garden heals through fragrance. Plant herbs that soothe the spirit.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on aromatic herbs and medicinal plants with therapeutic properties

cards.name: Astrological New Year
cards.meaning: The wheel turns anew. Set intentions for the growing season ahead.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest planning activities and seeds for the upcoming season

cards.name: Chicks
cards.meaning: Tender new life requires gentle care. Protect your seedlings as they emerge.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on starting seeds indoors and protecting young plants

cards.name: Community Garden
cards.meaning: Gardens grow stronger together. Share seeds, knowledge, and harvests.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest companion planting and varieties good for sharing

cards.name: Composting
cards.meaning: Death becomes life. Nourish your soil with nature's alchemy.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on soil preparation and plants that benefit from rich compost

cards.name: Creating Altars
cards.meaning: Make your garden a sacred space. Plant with reverence and beauty.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest ornamental and spiritually significant plants

cards.name: Daffodils
cards.meaning: Golden trumpets announce spring's arrival. Plant bulbs for future joy.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on spring bulbs and early-blooming flowers

cards.name: Easter Egg Hunt
cards.meaning: Hidden treasures await in the garden. Discover volunteer plants and surprises.
cards.agent_prompt: Encourage exploration and self-seeding varieties

cards.name: Eggshell Pots
cards.meaning: Use what you have. Simple containers hold great potential.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest seeds perfect for starting in small containers

cards.name: Eostre
cards.meaning: The goddess of spring blesses your garden. Balance light and dark, growth and rest.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on fertility and balanced garden planning

cards.name: Floromancy
cards.meaning: Flowers speak in silent language. Listen to what your garden tells you.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest flowers with symbolic meanings and divination uses

cards.name: Flower Wand
cards.meaning: Gather flowers for magic and beauty. Plant a cutting garden.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on flowers good for cutting and arrangements

cards.name: Garden Party
cards.meaning: Celebrate the garden's abundance. Plant for beauty and entertainment.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest ornamental plants and edibles perfect for entertaining

cards.name: Germination
cards.meaning: Life stirs beneath the soil. Trust in the process of emergence.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on starting seeds and optimal germination conditions

cards.name: Grasshopper
cards.meaning: Take a leap of faith. Try something new in your garden.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest experimental varieties or new growing techniques

cards.name: Hare
cards.meaning: Swift growth and abundant fertility. Fast-maturing plants thrive now.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on quick-growing varieties and succession planting

cards.name: Hot Cross Buns
cards.meaning: Spiced traditions nourish body and soul. Plant herbs for baking.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest culinary herbs and spices for baking

cards.name: Irish Moss
cards.meaning: Low-growing resilience carpets the earth. Plant ground covers for protection.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on ground covers and low-maintenance plants

cards.name: Jasmine
cards.meaning: Night-blooming sweetness under the moon. Plant fragrant evening flowers.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest fragrant flowers, especially night-blooming varieties

cards.name: Lamb
cards.meaning: Gentle new beginnings. Tend your garden with soft hands.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on gentle care and tender young plants

cards.name: Moon Milk
cards.meaning: Lunar nourishment for body and spirit. Harvest herbs under moonlight.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest herbs for moon milk and lunar rituals

cards.name: Mushrooms
cards.meaning: Hidden networks support all life. Nurture your soil's ecosystem.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on soil health and plants that benefit from mycorrhizal relationships

cards.name: Ostercierbaum
cards.meaning: Decorate branches with symbols of life. Create beauty from simple things.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest ornamental branches and decorative plants

cards.name: Painted Eggs
cards.meaning: Colour and creativity bless your garden. Plant for vibrant beauty.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on colourful flowers and vegetables

cards.name: Peach Moonstone
cards.meaning: Divine feminine energy nurtures growth. Trust your gardening intuition.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest nurturing practices and intuitive planting

cards.name: Pink Moon
cards.meaning: The Pink Moon illuminates spring's wild abundance. Plant with the lunar cycle.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on spring planting aligned with April full moon timing

cards.name: Plant Dyeing
cards.meaning: Plants give their colour to cloth and craft. Grow for beauty beyond the garden.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest plants good for natural dyeing

cards.name: Primrose
cards.meaning: First flowers of spring bring hope. Plant early bloomers.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on early spring flowers and cool-season plants

cards.name: Rainbow
cards.meaning: After rain comes colour and promise. Plant a diverse, colourful garden.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest diverse varieties in multiple colours

cards.name: Robin
cards.meaning: The robin's song announces spring. Welcome beneficial birds to your garden.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on plants that attract beneficial birds and support soil health

cards.name: Sacred Circle
cards.meaning: Create sacred space in your garden. Plant in circles for protection and intention.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest circular planting patterns and protective plants

cards.name: Seed Blessing
cards.meaning: Bless your seeds before planting. Infuse them with intention and love.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on starting new seeds with mindful intention

cards.name: Shortbread
cards.meaning: Simple ingredients create lasting joy. Plant herbs for traditional recipes.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest culinary herbs for baking and traditional recipes

cards.name: Simmer Pot
cards.meaning: Fill your home with garden scents. Grow herbs for simmer pots.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on aromatic herbs and citrus for simmer pots

cards.name: Spring Cleaning
cards.meaning: Clear away the old to make space for new growth. Prepare your garden beds.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on garden maintenance and bed preparation

cards.name: Spring Equinox
cards.meaning: Day and night balance perfectly. Plant with the turning of the wheel.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on spring planting aligned with equinox timing

cards.name: Spring Hike
cards.meaning: Walk in wild places. Observe what nature plants and learn from her.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest native plants and foraging opportunities

cards.name: Spring Rain
cards.meaning: Rain blesses the earth. Plant water-loving varieties and trust in nature's timing.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on moisture-loving plants and optimal watering

cards.name: Tea Party
cards.meaning: Gather herbs for tea and conversation. Plant a tea garden.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest herbs perfect for tea blends

cards.name: Terrarium
cards.meaning: Create a world in miniature. Small spaces hold great beauty.
cards.agent_prompt: Suggest plants suitable for terrariums and small containers

cards.name: Wreath Making
cards.meaning: Weave the garden's gifts into circles of beauty. Plant for crafting.
cards.agent_prompt: Focus on plants with good stems for wreath-making and dried arrangements

moon_phases.new: New beginnings, planting seeds, setting intentions
moon_phases.waning_crescent: Rest, reflection, preparation for new cycle
